executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description: The <y>Executioner<w> kills <y>aliens<w> and doesn't afraid of <y>anything<w>.

armedBackpack.name: Armed Backpack
armedBackpack.pickup: Chance of firing a bullet behind you.
armedBackpack.description: <y>18.5%</c> <c_stack>(+6.5% per stack)</c> chance on hit of <y>firing a bullet</c> behind you for <y>150% damage</c>.
armedBackpack.story:
Being secure is always important. I don't want you to get in trouble, so please wear this whenever you go out. 'Specially in the canyons, there's a lot of thieves there!
I'll send you some extra ammunition later this year, alright?

brassKnuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
brassKnuckles.pickup: Deal extra damage at close range.
brassKnuckles.description: Deal <y>35% extra damage</c> to enemies within <y>5m</c> <c_stack>(+2.5 per stack)</c>.
brassKnuckles.story:
We found this at the crime scene. We need to check for DNA against the rest of the evidence. I still cant believe they got away.
The back has some kind of symbol, maybe that could give us a clue. I'll be heading to the west of [REDACTED], I know someone who can help us solve the case.

detritiveTrematode.name: Detritive Trematode
detritiveTrematode.pickup: Low health enemies receive damage over time.
detritiveTrematode.description: Enemies with <y>5.5% health</c> <c_stack>(+2.75% per stack)</c> become <y>infected</c>, receiving <y>4% of max health</c> damage per second.
detritiveTrematode.story:
Eh, this is yours.
Don't send one of those weird microscopic egg hatcheries EVER again, please.

dormantFungus.name: Dormant Fungus
dormantFungus.description: Regenerates <g>2%</c> <c_stack>(+2% per stack)</c> of your health every second while <g>moving</c>.
dormantFungus.story:
When you commanded me to explore the fungal caves all I expected to find was.. well, fungi, of course. Though I wasn't excited by any means, this specimen caught my eye.
It seems to only grow around flowing water, and ever since I collected and contained this sample, both the colouration and the smell faded out quickly.

I hope you can study it further.

fork.name: Fork
fork.description: Increases your <y>base damage<w> by <y>3<w> <c_stack>(+3 per stack)</c>.
fork.destination:
Antima Building - Rooftop,
Blossom Hills,
Earth
fork.story:
Surprise! A fork! Hahaha!!!
You said any gift was a good gift, HERE YOU GO! Jokes aside, this fork is magical. Trust me Duncan, I once got to eat a salad with it and later that same day I found a cent!
Also uh please come play with us someday soon, we miss destroying your build in SS2 (please tell me you changed your main, lol).

watchMetronome.name: Watch Metronome
watchMetronome.pickup: Standing still charges speed for your next movement.
watchMetronome.description: Standing still charges a <b>speed boost</c> that decays over <b>3 seconds</c> <c_stack>(+3 per stack)</c>
watchMetronome.story:
Grandpa gave me this as a relic of the past. He says it belonged to our great-great-great-great-great grandfather. I couldn't care less about antiques and family belongings so I think it's best if you have it instead.
Not like it's of any use anyways..

wonderHerbs.name: Wonder Herbs
wonderHerbs.description: Increases <g>healing</c> from all sources by <g>12%</c> <c_stack>(+12% per stack)</c>.
wonderHerbs.story:
Rikka! I heard you're working with the EC on making a new recipe. Here at the farm we've been growing some special herbs which we think may come handy. They're known for being very, very useful for treating physical and emotional wounds.
If you need some more don't hesitate to call me! XOXO
- Eden

coffeeBag.name: Coffee Bag
coffeeBag.pickup: Gain a boost to movement and attack speed on interactable use.
coffeeBag.story: Sleeeeeeeeeeepyheaaaaaaaaaaaaaaad idk why u say u dont like coffee its so gooooood for staying up. ik ik theres other other ways to get hyped but oh boy i think u will dig this one, its my favorite!!! give it a try before yelling at me mmkay?

x4Stimulant.name: X4 Stimulant
x4Stimulant.destination:
Romeo 33,
Batang Ai National Park,
Earth
x4Stimulant.story:
Encased, including manual. Does the machine show symptoms of a 540? If so you may want to avoid using above 100ml of stimulant.

Cheers.

moltenCoin.name: Molten Coin
moltenCoin.pickup: Chance to ignite enemies on hit and gain gold
moltenCoin.description: &y&6% chance on hit to incinerate enemies&!& for 6 seconds, &y&earning $1&!&.
moltenCoin.story:
Hey! Uh, I'm sorry, I'm really sorry.. I know you really wanted me to keep this coin but I can't take the responsibility any more..
See, I accidentally put the coin at the edge of a plasma furnace so.. well.. it's a bit burnt on the side, please don't get mad at me..
